Example 2: Additional Allowance for Having Minor Children
Facts
: A surviving spouse with a child under the age of 18 had an original award of DIC with an effective date of entitlement of February 1, 2003.Â  The two-year period from date of initial entitlement ends January 31, 2005.
Result
: The surviving spouse would be entitled to the additional $250.00 for one month, from January 1, 2005, through January 31, 2005.
